item.title: Go Templates for Containers
item.description: Golang allows us to manage our containers more effectively. :zap: Introduction Currently it is not a secret that in the world of containers, the top 10 of the tools are created in Golang, (the programming language created by Google), which allows us to make use of the characteristics of this language for the administration of our containers. One of the most important steps in the administration of our containers is the visualization of the content of these or the inspection of the information of the same.
